channel.title: Export on Gary Flynn
channel.description: Recent content in Export on Gary Flynn

item.title: Export NSX DFW Rules using vRO
item.description: Many organisations are seeing the value of NSX-v in SDDC environments, however there is no easy way to export the NSX Distributed Firewall (DFW) rules from NSX to a CSV file. To export all rules in the environment, we need to extract each of the firewall rule IDs and get the details extracted for each rule. We will then export this information in a CSV file and optionally email it to the requestor.
